waitingOn.what: NoteLite project — Phase 2 implementation active (stories 1.2, 1.3, 1.4 complete with code review). Parallel story execution ongoing via PL dependency graph.
waitingOn.notes: Story 1.2 complete (Firebase setup - hybrid CLI/browser). Operator flagged browser overuse, root cause identified: BMAD planning artifacts written for humans not agents. Fixed upstream with workspace wrappers.

notes.text: Pre-compaction #8. CLI-first policy enforcement — operator flagged NoteLite story 1.2 using too much browser automation. Root cause: BMAD workflows designed for human collaboration, but Winston/Bob output is executed by agents. Fixed upstream: created factory-principles.md (CLI-first is principle #1), added Factory Automation Context to Winston/Bob workspace wrappers, updated Amelia TOOLS.md. Did NOT touch BMAD templates — only workspace configs. Commits: eb94fb1 (factory-principles), 2cce900 (Winston/Bob context), 0008d77 (changelog). Story 1.2 accepted as-is (working, 80% CLI).

Pre-compaction #7. Research Lead flow v3.0 committed (2c7d94e) — problem-first discovery rewrite. Brainstormed with operator: 4 discovery strategies, inverted scoring (Solution Gap replaces Market Size, penalizes crowdedness). Next: update downstream agent configs (Mary, RL, CIS).
Pre-compaction #6. Git commit for flat projects/ still pending (staged files ready). NoteLite gate check active. RL v2.0 test overdue — needs status check.
Pre-compaction #5. Flattened projects/ dir (removed active/archived subdirs). Fixed BMAD template paths in 5 agent configs. All core docs + agent configs verified — zero stale path refs remain.
